location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: 'File 5/20 Flying of Flags by B.I.S.N. Company'

physicalDescription.extent: This file is arranged approximately in chronological order. Circled index numbers written using red and blue crayon are also present in the file.
Foliation: The foliation sequence commences at the front cover and terminates at the back cover; these numbers are written in pencil and can be found in the top right of the recto side of each folio.

mods.abstract: This file contains correspondence between the British Political Agent at Bahrain; the British Political Resident in the Persian Gulf at Bahrain; the Residency Agent at Sharjah; and representatives of Gray, Mackenzie and Company Limited. These papers concern the practice of merchants' vessels, for example British India Steam Navigation (BISN), flying local national flags while visiting ports in Kuwait, Bahrain, Qatar and the Trucial Coast in addition to the flag of the state where the vessel was registered.
